events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but the shipping is still delayed and the tracking info hasn’t updated in days.
The customer's message contains keywords related to a delay in shipping and tracking problems, categorizing the case under Delivery Delay.
Assigning the case to the customer support agent specializing in shipment and tracking issues for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. Let me check the status for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the tracking details for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Greenway Drive, Springfield.
Thank you for the info. I see a delay with the courier service. I will prioritize your shipment and provide an updated estimated delivery time within 24 hours.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate you looking into this and hope the delivery arrives soon.
The courier has updated the status, and your package is now out for delivery. Please expect it to arrive by the end of the day.
Just following up to ensure your package arrived safely. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Since your issue has been resolved and there are no further questions, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
